channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17165] Add retry to LoadIncrementalHFiles tool
item.description: As using the LoadIncrementalHFiles tool with S3 as the filesystem is prone to failing due to FileNotFoundExceptions due to inconsistency, simple, configurable retry logic was added.

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
